InfoResponseDto.description:
DTO for information response
Extends the base response class and adds integration information

IntegrationInfoDto.description:
DTO for integration information
Contains all information related to a service integration

description.description: Description of the integration and its services (optional)

menu.description: Option that will appear in the "Main Menu" section (optional)

onboardingUrl.description: The url for the onboarding process after installation of the integration

requiredRoles.description: The roles that need to be accepted by the company

settings.description: Option that will appear in the "Settings" section (optional)

type.description:
The notification type which can be email, sms or push
Each integration supports only one type of notification

MenuDto.description:
DTO for menu items
Extends TabDto and adds icon information

MenuDto_1.description:
DTO for menu items
Extends TabDto and adds icon information

icon.description: The icon to be displayed for the menu item

label.description: The name to be displayed for the menu item

tabs.description:
The list of tabs that will appear in the submenu and as a navigation bar above the main content
In case of only one tab, there will be neither a submenu nor a navigation bar.

TabDto.description:
DTO for tabs
Used for defining tabs in the user interface

label.description: The label displayed on the tab

url.description:
The URL associated with the tab.
The requests coming from the hoster will be signed
with jwt, which will contain information about the company
